page.title: 02Bridport's Shopping Centre
page.content: The shopping centre is larger than would be expected for a town the size of Bridport as it also serves many of the surrounding villages, as well as the influx of visitors during the summer period. The three main shopping streets, East Street, West Street and South Street, meet at the Town Hall forming a T-shape. The busiest days are Friday and the two market days, Wednesday and Saturday. Thursday is early closing day. There is a wide variety of shops including supermarkets, greengrocers, bakers, clothes, shoe, D-I-Y, gift, newsagents, book and electrical shops. There are also a number of estate agents, banks and solicitors offices. The numerous cafes and pubs offer shoppers a wide choice of refreshment.
